title: Balance Aromatherapy Blend
description: Balance Aromatherapy Essential Oil Blend aromatherapy blend of pure essential oils
cleaned_text: This is an Aromatherapy Blend of PURE ESSENTIAL OILS. Rose Geranium, Ylang Ylang and Lavender essential oils come together in this harmonizing blend for a balancing effect on the mind. The synergy of these pure essential oils promotes emotional balance and well being. Used on the skin, this blend will help balance the skin's own natural oil production. Uses: - Add Balance Essential Oil Blend to your steamy bath water for emotional balance and skin soothing properties. - Add a few drops of Balance oil to pillows or sheets at bedtime. - Nourish your skin with an aromatherapy steam facial using Balance Essential Oil Blend. - Dab on your wrists for a herbaceous, floral perfume. - Diffuse Balance oil for a relaxing, emotional balancing environment. - Keep oil bottle on hand to sniff when you feel anxious. - Add a drop to a wet cotton ball and apply to skin for a radiant glow. Directions for use: Diffusion: Use three to four drops in the diffuser of your choice. Topical use: Apply one to two drops to desired area. Dilute essential oils with Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil or Coconut Oil to minimize any skin sensitivity. Cautions: Possible skin sensitivity. Keep out of reach of children.
